name: Pelepay standalone embedder
author: EOI - Web Like This!

sections.description:
This plugin will integrate Pelepay payment option into your wordpress blog / website easily and comfortably. All you have to do after you installed the plugin is go to settings -> pelepay configuration and enter your pelepay email address. This will create a price field on each post / page.

2 options to embed the payment buttons:

  1. Once filled the price field, the payment button will appear on that page / post

  2. Using shortcode to embed more than a single payment button [pelepay price=’xx’ name=’yyy’]

Payments made to you by these buttons will appear in your pelepay account summary.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin folder ‘pelepay’ to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

How to set up a pelepay account An answer to that question. please follow the signup instructions at pelepay.co.il
